data.title: The Virtuous Husband
data.meta_description: A man marries at a young age and bases all of his marriage decisions on advice written in letters from his dead mother. The wife can't stand it and eventually burns them, and the man grows more tolerable.but Elliott Nugent as Daniel Curtis Betty Compson as Inez Wakefield Jean Arthur as Barbara...
data.text:
Plot[]

A man marries at a young age and bases all of his marriage decisions on advice written in letters from his dead mother. The wife can't stand it and eventually burns them, and the man grows more tolerable.but

Cast[]

Elliott Nugent as Daniel Curtis Betty Compson as Inez Wakefield Jean Arthur as Barbara Olwell Tully Marshall as Ezra Hunniwell J. C. Nugent as Mr. Olwell Alison Skipworth as Mrs. Olwell Eva McKenzie as Hester Willie Best as Luftus

[[Category:Universal Studios]
